data.title: Classroom of the Monarchy or the Kingdom of Asturias
meta_keywords: Classroom of the monarchy or the kingdom of asturias
data.meta_description: Classroom of the Monarchy or the Kingdom of Asturias in Cangas de On√≠s: Find opening hours and directions, compare prices before booking, see photos, and read reviews
data.text: The Classroom of the Kingdom of Asturias is a cultural space that offers a journey through the history of the Monarchy Astur, especially by the kings who held court in Cangas de Onis. You can understand the importance of the Asturian monarchy in Spain Thanks to an exhibition of the time (VIII-X), to panels, audiovisual materials, etc
